rules_text:
Escalate {U} [i](Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)[/i]
Choose one or more –
• Counter target creature spell.
• Return target creature to its owner’s hand.
• Until end of turn, target creature has base    power and toughness 0/2 and loses all          abilities.
notes: fluffy: it’s —> its, Target creature becomes 0/2 and loses all abilities until end of turn. —> Until end of turn, target creature has base power and toughness 0/2 and loses all abilities. (Creeperhulk, http://magiccards.info/query?q=o%3A%22target+creature+becomes%22&v=card&s=edition)
